column5: I don't know why, but everytime I try to open the current circular for BPS I get the header for the page and nothing else.  Anyone have any thoughts?  If anyone else can get it, can you tell me if the Pete Maina combo is in there?  Thanks, Maureen
Seems fine to me Maureen - try this direct link maybe: Click here for BPS Spring Classic Circular
Nope still doesn't work  ...guess I'll just have to stop in on Thursday or Friday thanks anyway  maureen
Trying to spend that gift card already eh girl The Pete Maina's aren't on sale in the flyer, but I know they went on sale last year so maybe they will again soon.  I'll let you know if I see them.
Thanks Roger, I've been wanting one for over a year but couldn't justify it to myself, the gift certificate will be a big help.  Maureen
I've got one myself and its become my favourite Musky rod and reel.  Can cast the lumber with it all day without blowing the arm out!
